column1: Smoque BBQ////The brisket was fork tender & moist.  The ribs melted in your mouth.  I was also impressed with the sides.  The Baked beans have real chunks of brisket in them.   The fries are crisp and hot and served in paper bag.  Also the price is right I got out for under $20 bucks and I won't have to eat for the rest of the day.
